content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <rdf:RDF   xmlns:dcterms="http://purl.org/dc/terms/"   xmlns:documentcontainer="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/portal_types/documentContainer#"   xmlns:file="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/portal_types/File#"   xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#" >   <file:File rdf:about="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/metadata/82a0f4a1-01ff-4ed1-853e-224d8404b3fd/lcm2007-final-report">     <dcterms:title xml:lang="en">LCM2007 Final Report</dcterms:title>     <dcterms:isPartOf>       <documentcontainer:documentContainer rdf:about="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/metadata/82a0f4a1-01ff-4ed1-853e-224d8404b3fd">         <dcterms:title xml:lang="en">Land Cover Map 2007 (1km dominant aggregate class, GB)</dcterms:title>         <dcterms:hasPart rdf:resource="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/metadata/82a0f4a1-01ff-4ed1-853e-224d8404b3fd/lcm2007-final-report"/>         <dcterms:hasPart rdf:resource="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/metadata/82a0f4a1-01ff-4ed1-853e-224d8404b3fd/lcm2007-dataset-documentation-version-1"/>         <dcterms:hasPart rdf:resource="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/metadata/82a0f4a1-01ff-4ed1-853e-224d8404b3fd/lcm2007technical-details"/>         <dcterms:isPartOf rdf:resource="http://eidchub.ceh.ac.uk/metadata"/>         <dcterms:description xml:lang="en">Land Cover Map 2007 (LCM2007) is a parcel-based thematic classification of satellite image data covering the entire United Kingdom. The map updates and upgrades the Land Cover Map of Great Britain (LCMGB) 1990 and LCM2000. Like the earlier 1990 and 2000 products, LCM2007 is derived from a computer classification of satellite scenes obtained mainly from Landsat, IRS and SPOT sensors. It also covers Northern Ireland and incorporates information derived from other ancillary datasets. LCM2007 was classified using a nomenclature corresponding to Joint Nature Conservation Committee (JNCC) Broad Habitats, which encompasses the entire range of UK habitats. In addition, it recorded further detail where possible , incorporating land cover classes sought by other users. LCM2007 is produced in both vector and raster formats, with a number of different versions containing varying levels of detail and at different spatial resolutions. Product consists of 1km raster, dominant aggregate class (aggregation of Target Classes).  Great Britain only. THIS DATASET HAS NOW BEEN SUPERSEDED - please search for 'Land Cover Map 2007 (1km dominant aggregate class, GB) v1.2'. </dcterms:description>         <dcterms:modified
